fileSelect.title: Select Image File
fileSelect.placeholder: Drag image here or click to select file
fileSelect.description: Supports JPG, PNG, GIF, BMP, WebP formats, max 50MB

preview.title: Image Compression Preview
preview.description: After selecting an image, preview and compression results will be displayed here
preview.waiting: Please wait, compression may take a few seconds
preview.previewDescription: Configure compression options and click compress button to see results

settings.title: WebP Compression Settings
settings.qualityTip1: Higher quality means larger file size but better image quality
settings.qualityTip2: Lossless compression maintains original quality but may result in larger files
settings.qualityTip4: Large files recommend lower quality for better compression
settings.wasmTip: Using WASM WebP compression provides better compression and faster processing. Compressed files will be saved in .webp format.
